column4: what key command do I use to bring up that window I can type commands in like xkill?
alt-f2?
ya, that is what I thought it was... but it does nothing :(
check system->settings->keyboard
the keyboard shortcut window?
yes, it should have an entry for this window
ok, there it us, Show the panel run application dialog, and the shortcut is what you said it should be but it still does nothing.
change it to your choice... maybe it called it differently
don't laugh too hard, but I guess I can not set it to alt-f3 =P
why that?
deskbar running? ;-)
because it shutdown my xwindows and logged me out
do you know why?
know why what?
why this key combo kicked you?
not exactly, just assume it shutsdown my xwindows and logs me out.
i guess you know how to change the combos, right? when you active an entry all other combos are _deactivated_, so you should not see any side effects
well I clicked on it to activate it and tried to put the combo but it just shut me down.
weird..... do you have other software running that takes key shortcuts?
I was running cedega on the other desktop
